page.title: 12 VISITING THE STUD
page.content: On Monday 1st of July we went to{ {Littleton Stud}.We had to interview{ {Mr.Martin,the Head Groom.}We asked him forty questions about what he does.We found out that only seven people work for him.He lives on the premises and is married with two children who are still at school doing the{Domesday Project.}He has sixty to seventy horses from January to June and ten to twenty horses from July to December.They are all thorough breds and there is only one stallion,he is black and has{forty}mares.The stud owns eighty boxes and three paddocks. On the land there is a drovers' drive and an Iron Age fort.The foals are born between January and June ,this is so that the foals will be the right age to race with their age group.All horses have an official birthday on 1st January.Many customers are foreign
